Events that occurred on 12 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1921 - Film producer and businessman Saul Zaentz is born.
1934 - Voice actress Annette Crosbie is born.
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 11a.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222b.
1961 - Joseph Pearce is born.
1971 - Voice actor Scott Menville is born.
2010 - A Tolkien English Glossary is published.
